feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-24T19:52:00.879314Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;注意力持续时间是否在下降？</stitle>; <id>;https://slimemoldtimemold.com/2023/07/24/your-mystery-have-attention-spans-been-declined/</ id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T17:51:41.010724Z</更新>; <link href="https://slimemoldtimemold.com/2023/07/24/your-mystery-have-attention-spans-been-declined/"/>; <作者>; <name>;janandonly</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=janandonly</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://slimemoldtimemold.files.wordpress.com/2023/07/image-8.png" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;在过去二十年中，个人注意力持续时间可能下降了 65%，这一点令人担忧，因为知识工作取决于对手头任务的注意力。关于这个话题的直接研究很少，但有人声称注意力持续时间一直在下降，特别是随着社交媒体和智能手机的广泛使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#have-attention-spans-been-declined" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36851644" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;注意力关闭了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.evanmiller.org/attention-is-off-by-one.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T17:51:41.011809Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.evanmiller.org/attention-is-off-by-one.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;elbasti</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=elbasti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.evanmiller.org/images/index/wizard2.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;注意力公式是现代人工智能的核心方程，但其中有一个错误，上周一直让我发疯。在这篇文章中，作者解释了当前一代 AI 模型如何在关键位置出现逐一错误，导致 Transformer 模型难以压缩和部署。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#attention-is-off-by-one" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36851494" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Zenbleed</stitle>; <id>;https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/zenbleed.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T14:51:41.012692Z</更新>; <link href="https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/zenbleed.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;loeg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =loeg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/img/zb-vpcmpeqb.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;最近的CPU已将向量寄存器的宽度扩展到256位甚至512位，这在各种情况下都很有用。本文讨论了标准 C 库函数中向量寄存器的使用以及使用 vzeroupper 指令以避免不必要的停顿的必要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zenbleed" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36848680" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;40年前昨天加拿大航空 143 号航班在飞行途中耗尽燃油</stitle>; <id>;https://www.damninteresting.com/the-gimli-glider/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T16:51:41.013513Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.damninteresting.com/the-gimli-glider/"/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://damn-8791.kxcdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2007/11/cover-new-2020.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：138px；" />;<br />;1983 年 7 月 23 日，加拿大航空 143 号航班出现燃油压力警告，最终在飞行途中耗尽燃油。飞行员利用飞机的滑翔能力成功紧急着陆。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#40-years-ago-yesterday-air-canada-flight-143-ran-out-of-fuel-mid-flight" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36850111" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;元变压器：变压器正在变得多模式</stitle>; <id>;https://kxgong.github.io/meta_transformer/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T17:51:41.014332Z</updated>; <link href="https://kxgong.github.io/ meta_transformer/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ulrikhansen54</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ulrikhansen54</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kxgong.github.io/meta_transformer/static/images/teaser.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：198px；" />;<br />;多模态学习涉及利用来自各种模态的数据来提高模型能力。这项研究提出了一种名为 Meta Transformer 的新颖方法，该方法演示了具有冻结参数的网络可以对来自不同模态的数据进行编码并实现良好的性能，从而形成用于处理自然语言、2D 图像、3D 点云和音频频谱图的统一框架。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#meta-transformers-transformers-are-becoming-multi-modal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36851505" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：我花了 2 年时间构建个人理财模拟器</stitle>; <id>;https://projectionlab.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T15:51:41.015151Z</updated>; <link href="https://projectionlab.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;scubakid</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=scubakid</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/dwihlaln3/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto,w_512/v1685146309/home/home-hero.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：179px；" />;<br />;ProjectionLab 是一款功能强大的工具，可帮助可视化投资、支出等随时间的变化。它使用户能够做出明智的财务决策并规划未来。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-spent-2-years-building-a-personal-finance-simulator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36849502" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Elixir（仍然）安全</stitle>; <id>;https://paraxis.io/blog/still-safe</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T18:51:41.015942Z</updated>; <link href="https://paraxis.io/blog/still-safe"/>; <author>; <name>;manusachi</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=manusachi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://paraxis.io/blog/cheetah.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;文章“Elixir 是安全的”讨论了使用 Elixir 的安全优势，重点关注内存和线程安全。它强调了 Elixir 消除了数据竞争带来的安全问题，并强调了经验验证的重要性。然而，针对该文章发表的一篇论文声称，Elixir 程序仍然存在漏洞，而没有考虑原始文章中提到的具体安全优势。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elixir-is-still-safe" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36852231" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Driver.js：产品介绍、亮点、上下文帮助等</stitle>; <id>;https://driverjs.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:51:41.016740Z</updated>; <link href="https://driverjs.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://driverjs.com/driver.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 324px;" />;<br />;由于其广泛的 API，driver.js 可用于广泛的用例。通过突出显示功能，您可以消除干扰并将用户的注意力集中在重要的事情上。为您的用户提供上下文帮助，解释如何使用您的产品并回答常见问题。突出显示新功能，解释如何使用它们并确保您的用户不会错过它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#driver-js-product-tours-highlights-contextual-help-and-more" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846520" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我构建了公交出行时间地图</stitle>; <id>;https://map.henryn.xyz</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:51:41.017518Z</updated>; <link href="https://map.henryn.xyz"/>; <author>; <name>;ng-henry</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycomb inator.com/user?id=ng-henry</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-built-a-transit-travel-time-map" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847960" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;文本嵌入显示（几乎）与文本一样多</stitle>; <id>;https://openreview.net/forum?id=wK7wUdiM5g0</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T18:51:41.018306Z</updated>; <link href=" https://openreview.net/forum?id=wK7wUdiM5g0"/>; <作者>; <name>;jxmorris12</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jxmorris12</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://openreview.net/images/pdf_icon_blue.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;我们提出了 Vec2Text，一种可以准确恢复 90% 的 32 个令牌嵌入输入的方法。我们研究了嵌入反转问题，重建了密集文本嵌入中表示的全文。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#text-embeddings-reveal-almost-as-much-as-text" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36851930" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Wasm_of_OCaml</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ocaml </id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T15:51:41.019090Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ocaml"/>; <作者>; <name>;eriangazag</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eriangazag</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://opengraph.githubassets.com/7533499ebb7448d12547f839cbc99c9a6acd183051c823f58c36c57ecfa856ed/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ocaml" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Wasm_of_ocaml 依赖于 Binaryen 工具链。生成的代码适用于 Chrome beta 和 Node V8 canary。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#wasm-of-ocaml" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36849478" target="_ Blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;容量规划者如何可靠地估计应用程序性能</stitle>; <id>;https://queue.acm.org/detail.cfm?id=3595862</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T15:51:41.0205 91Z</updated>; <link href="https://queue.acm.org/detail.cfm?id=3595862"/>; <作者>; <name>;yarapavan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yarapavan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dl.acm.org/cms/attachment/html/10.1145/3595 862/assets/html/cb1.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 200px;" />;<br />;要衡量程序的性能，您需要查看给定负载下它使用的 CPU 量并尝试相乘。响应时间曲线是决定程序性能的重要因素。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-capacity-planners-credively-estimate-application-performance" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.height: 200px;" />;<br />; ycombinator.com/item?id=36849784" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Pikchr：用于技术文档中图表的类似 PIC 的标记语言</stitle>; <id>;https://pikchr.org/home/doc/trunk/doc/userman.md</ id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:51:41.022165Z</updated>; <link href="https://pikchr.org/home/doc/trunk/doc/userman.md"/>; <author>; <name>;gjadi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gjadi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这是使用 Pi 生成图表的指南kchr. 这里的目标是提供有关使用 Pikchr 的实用且易于理解的教程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pikchr-a-pic-like-markup-language-for-diagrams-in-technical-documentation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847133" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN: Artie (YC S23) – 实时数据复制到数据仓库</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:51:41.023108Z</updated>; <link href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569"/>; <author>; <name>;tang8330</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tang8330</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Artie 是一个开源数据流解决方案，可解决数据仓库中生产数据过时的问题。它支持从数据库到数据仓库的实时数据复制，具有亚分钟级的延迟并显着节省成本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-artie-yc-s23-real-time-data-replication-to-data-warehouses" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;铂金包的秘密经济学</stitle>; <id>;https://businessday.ng/life-arts/article/the-secret-economics-of-the-birkin-bag/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T17:51:41.023880Z</updated>; <link href="https://businessday.ng/life -arts/article/the-secret-economics-of-the-birkin-bag/"/>; <作者>; <name>;gsatic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gsatic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://149520306.v2.pressablecdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/bag-1.png"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：126像素；” />;<br />;爱马仕 (Hermès) 打造的柏金包 (Birkin bag) 是世界上最昂贵的手提包，起售价为 7,000 美元。这款包的昂贵价格归因于其精致的做工和炫耀性消费的理念。然而，Birkin 并不是典型的维勃伦商品，因为它不容易辨认，也没有明显的品牌标志。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-secret-economics-of-the-birkin-bag" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36832999" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人类骨骼形态的遗传结构和进化</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.adf8009</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T16:51:41.024664Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.adf8 009"/>; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-genic-architecture-and-evolution-of-the- human-skeletal-form" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=36833017" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;现金失忆症</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gsb.stanford.edu/insights/indulging-guilty-pleasure-dont-put-it-card</id>; <更新>; 2023-07-24T14：51：41.025477Z </更新>; <link href="https://www.gsb.stanford.edu/insights/indulging-guilty-pleasure-dont-put-it-card"/>; <作者>; <名称>;giuliomagnifico </ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico </ uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.gsb.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/1630x_variable/public/2023-07/photo-idea-Szu-chi-key.jpg.webp?itok=k4fXSppk" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;随着在线购物和数字支付的兴起，现金在美国的作用已经减弱。然而，一项新的研究表明，现金具有易于遗忘的优点，使消费者能够避免面对自己的支出记录。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cash-amnesia" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36848305" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;你能听懂鸟的声音吗？测试一下你对叫声和歌曲的识别能力</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2023/07/21/science/bird-calls-songs-quiz.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T15:51:41.026239Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2023/07/21/science/bird-calls-songs-quiz.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fortran77</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fortran77</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/07/20/science/00bird-quiz-top/B--E--Small-master315.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;鸟类（而非灵长类动物）的声音复杂性和变异性与人类最接近。鸟类学家通过鸟类叫声数据库在理解鸟类交流方面取得了进展。鸟鸣与人类语言、地区方言和文化进化有相似之处。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#can-you-understand-bird-test-your-recognition-of-calls-and-songs" target="_b lank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835900" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;更改 Android 强制门户页面 (2020)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.encrypted.at /android-captive-portal/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:51:41.027823Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.encrypted.at/android-captive-portal/"/>; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://www.crypted.at/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/android-debugging.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 126px;" />;<br />;如果您不希望 Android 手机在切换网络时始终联系 Google 服务器，您可以自行托管强制门户页面。为此，您需要一个 Web 服务器并能够返回“204 无内容”HTTP 状态代码。您可以通过打开手机的 shell/终端连接并使用适当的命令来更改 URL。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#changing-the-android-captive-portal- page-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846567" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;数学宇宙假说 (2007)</stitle>; < id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/0704.0646</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T13:51:41.028598Z</更新>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/0704.0646"/>; <作者>; <name>;aerialfrog</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aerialfrog</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;本文探讨了外部现实假说 (ERH) 的物理含义，并认为它暗示了数学宇宙假说 (MUH)。它讨论了 ERH 和 MUH 的各种含义，从标准物理主题到意识和平行宇宙等更广泛的问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mathematical-universe-hypothesis-2007" target="_b lank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847958" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MermaidJS 中序列图的不合理有效性</stitle>; <id>;https://jessems。 com/posts/2023-07-22-the-unreasonable-effectness-of-sequence-diagrams-in-mermaidjs</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T10:51:41.030190Z</更新>; <link href="https://jessems.com/posts/2023-07-22-the-unreasonable- effectiveness-of-sequence-diagram s-in-mermaidjs"/>; <作者>; <name>;jessems</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jessems</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jessems.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F20230722225447.477bc2cf.png&w=1 920&q=75" style="宽度:220px; height: 90px;" />;<br />;使用 MermaidJS 在代码中创建序列图非常令人愉快。它们快速、轻松且美观。MermaidJS 与 Markdown 工具相结合是在实践中使用序列图的便捷方法。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-unreasonable- effectiveness-of-sequence-diagrams-in-mermaidjs" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845714" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Unicode 字符“𝕏” (U+1D54F)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D 54F</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T11:51:41.031729Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D54F"/>; <作者>; <name>;t0m44c</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=t0m44c</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;U+ 1D54F 是字符数学双打大写 X 的 unicode 十六进制值。Char U+1D54F，编码，HTML 实体：𝕏、𝕏、𝕏、UTF-8（十六进制）、UTF-16（十六进制）、UTF-32（十六进制）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unicode-character-u- 1d54f" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”</stitle>; <id>;https:// techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T09:51:41.032490Z</updated>; <link href="https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/"/>; <作者>; <name>;pallas_athena</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pallas_athena</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/x-twitter.jpg?w=730" style="width: 220px; height: 101px;" />;<br />;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”。Twitter 首席执行官埃隆·马斯克宣布了徽标更改，并暗示 Twitter 品牌将进一步发生变化。马斯克对字母“X”的痴迷是众所周知的，因为他创立了多家名称中带有“X”的公司。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845111" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nat 类型</stitle>; <id>;https://www.roxlu.com/2021/07 0/nat-types</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T12:51:41.033226Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.roxlu.com/2021/070/nat-types"/>; <作者>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://www.roxlu.com/images/posts/2021/070.nat-sent-packets.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;在深入研究点对点通信时，您会遇到 STUN、ICE 和 NAT。本文重点介绍 NAT 的工作原理以及您需要了解的有关点对点连接的知识。NAT 是一种用于在您的网络和其他网络之间转换数据包的设备，它在 Internet 的运行中发挥着至关重要的作用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nat-types" target="_b lank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846597" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;IBM 大型机：它如何运行以及为何生存</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/ information-technology/2023/07/the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:51:41.034090Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it -survives/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbc</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/new_IBM_z16-800x452.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;大型机至今仍然具有重要意义，估计有 10,000 台在使用中。它们被世界上最大的公司使用，其中大部分来自 IBM。大型机旨在处理大量数据工作负载并提供高可靠性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846195" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
